page.title: 10Reed Sports Club - Ditton
page.content: Reed International provides extensive facilities and well-kept sports grounds at Cobdown (Ditton) for its employees and pensioners. Other companies on the adjacent Reed site share the facilities and help with the running costs. A new clubhouse was built in 1985 for Reed Int. Sports and Social Club - the Oasthouse previously used has been taken over by Reed Catering Services. The new premises include a room for dances, discos and dinner parties. There is a kitchen, meeting room and 4 changing rooms. The "77" Pavilion has a laundry for kit, dining room/kitchen for teams catering for themselves, and 10 changing rooms. Facilities also include a sauna, gym, 6 football, 4 cricket & 4 hockey pitches, 6 tennis courts, 2 bowling greens and a nine-hole golf course.
